name: AXIS DRIFTER
description:
AXIS DRIFTER is an arcade themed space shooter which consists of two views. The vertical view (or the y-axis) controls altitude while the horizontal view (the x-axis) controls sideward drift. Players are to shoot down enemies and avoid obstacles, all while piloting a space ship through both perspectives. Are you up for the challenge?

CONTROLS

WASD/ARROW KEYS  - MOVE SHIP

SPACE BAR / LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT

Made in under 48 hours for BYOG 2021 for the theme "Two Views."

3D Ship models and music are from OpenGameArt and have been used and modified under the CC0 License.

https://opengameart.org/content/3d-spaceships-pack

https://opengameart.org/content/no-stars
